question: Bring out the correct statement:
option1: The Group of Thirty-Three (G-33) superseded the G-22 and was itself superseded by the G-20
option2: The Group of Twenty-Two (G-22) superseded the G-33 and was itself superseded by the G-20
option3: The Group of Seven (G-7) superseded the G-15 and was itself superseded by the G-20
option4: The Group of Eight (G-8) superseded the G-15 and was itself superseded by the G-20
answer: The Group of Thirty-Three (G-33) superseded the G-22 and was itself superseded by the G-20
